de.lambeck.pned.application

Class AbstractApplicationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
      • de.lambeck.pned.application.AbstractApplicationController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInfo_DrawingAreaSize, IInfo_MousePos, IInfo_SelectionRangeSize, IInfo_Status, java.awt.event.WindowFocusListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.event.WindowStateListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApplicationController

    public abstract class AbstractApplicationController
extends java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
implements IInfo_MousePos, IInfo_SelectionRangeSize, IInfo_DrawingAreaSize, IInfo_Status
    Observes the application (e.g. attempt to close with unsaved changes). Holds a reference to the status bar so that the application controller can show status messages etc.
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

      • activeFile

        protected java.lang.String activeFile
        This attribute holds the full path name of the file represented by the active tab.

        Note: This attribute is updated whenever the TabListener detects a new tab selection. The TabListener invokes setActiveFile(index).

      • currentDirectory

        protected java.io.File currentDirectory
        The last used directory

      • getActiveFile

        public java.lang.String getActiveFile()
        Getter for activeFile.

        Note: FileSaveAsAction should check this to make sure that there is a file to save.
        Returns:
        the active file; null if no file is open

      • getCurrentDirectory

        public java.io.File getCurrentDirectory(java.lang.String action)
        Returns the current working directory for file choosers.
        Parameters:
        action - The action requesting this working directory (for an example "FileSaveAsAction").
        Returns:
        The current directory depending on the Action; null on FileSaveAsAction for a new, still unsaved file
